description: [BADHATCH](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1081) can use SOCKS4 and SOCKS5 proxies to connect to actor-controlled C2 servers. [BADHATCH](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1081) can also emulate a reverse proxy on a compromised machine to connect with actor-controlled C2 servers.(Citation: BitDefender BADHATCH Mar 2021)

external_references.description: Vrabie, V., et al. (2021, March 10). FIN8 Returns with Improved BADHATCH Toolkit. Retrieved September 8, 2021.
